page.title: 10POLITICS,EDUCATION,LAW&ORDER
page.content: {Government-}Local Parish Council at Manaccan. Parish Meeting at St.Anthony.There are polling stations provided in the village at the time of General Elections. Recently erected "motorway_style" road signs have been heavily criticized. { {Education}_ Children attend the Local primary school until the age of 11 and then go on to Mullion or Helston Comprehensive School and 6th forms. Some attend Corn. College of Further and Higher Ed. at Camborne.They have to go out of the county to attend universities. {Law and Order}Nearest police station is at Helston about 10 miles away. 3 Community Police are based at Mullion who patrol the area by car daily. Crime consists mainly of house thefts and thefts from boats. Recently drug abuse has become more common.
